Posts.Content:
Hi Susie
Thanks so much for the reply, ill head over to that site now! Unfortunately she is terminal as per her doctors outside the US, so it might be a fruitless effort, but trying to help if i can.
Best Wishes
Husband DX 02/08/17
Age 50
PSA 09/15 4.1
PSA 01/17 5.6
DRE NEG, BX 4 Cores Positive of 12 Gleason 7 (3+4) (40%) - 02/17
RALP 04/03 .... 2 day Hosp stay
Cath removal 04/12 ... Continent! 
Final Pathology PT3A EPE+,PNI +, negative margins (<3mm), SVI and nodes (5 taken) Gleason (3+4). 50% tumor
Posts.Title: NYC oncologist recommendation

Posts.Content:
HI everyone
I hope you are all well, I'm from the prostate cancer forum but I have a family member who is looking into getting a second opinion in NYC and I was wondering if anyone can recommend a medical oncologist preferably MSKCC or similar. She is not based in the USA so if she was to look into treatment over here we would want it to be with the best! (Who doesn't!) 
Thanks in advance for any replies
Posts.Title: NYC oncologist recommendation
